Module com.example.proyecto3_
Package com.example.proyecto3_.model.Game

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
com.example.proyecto3_.model.Game.GameModel
public class GameModel extends Object
Represents the game logic with Queue and Map structures. Manages players, deck, table cards, and game state.

    Inner class to represent overall game statistics.

    Inner class for individual player statistics.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameModel

      public GameModel(int numBots)
      Creates a new game with specified number of bots. Initializes deck, players, and game structures.
      Parameters:
      numBots - number of machine players (1-3)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if numBots is not between 1 and 3

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the game by dealing cards and placing initial card. Deals 4 cards to each player and places one card on the table.
      Throws:
      InvalidGameStateException - if no players exist

    • getStats

      public GameModel.GameStats getStats()
      Gets the game statistics.
      Returns:
      the game stats

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Gets the current player whose turn it is.
      Returns:
      the current player
      Throws:
      InvalidGameStateException - if player index is invalid

    • getPlayers

      public List<Player> getPlayers()
      Gets all players in the game.
      Returns:
      list of players

    • getTableSum

      public int getTableSum()
      Gets the current sum of card values on the table.
      Returns:
      the sum on the table

    • getTopCard

      public Card getTopCard()
      Gets the top card on the table (last played card).
      Returns:
      the top card, or null if table is empty

    • playCard

      public void playCard(Card card) throws InvalidMoveException
      Plays a card from current player's hand to the table. Validates the move and updates game state.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to play
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException - if the move is invalid

    • drawCard

      public Card drawCard() throws DeckEmptyException
      Draws a card for the current player from the deck. Automatically recycles table cards if deck is empty.
      Returns:
      the drawn card
      Throws:
      DeckEmptyException - if deck is empty and cannot be recycled

    • recycleDeck

      private void recycleDeck()
      Recycles cards from table back to deck (except the last one). Called automatically when deck is empty.

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Moves to the next player's turn. Skips eliminated players and updates turn queue.

    • eliminateCurrentPlayer

      public void eliminateCurrentPlayer() throws NoValidCardException
      Eliminates the current player from the game. Returns player's cards to deck and marks them as eliminated.
      Throws:
      NoValidCardException - if player has no valid cards
      InvalidGameStateException - if player can still play

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over. Game ends when only one player remains active.
      Returns:
      true if only one player remains, false otherwise

    • getWinner

      public Player getWinner()
      Gets the winner of the game.
      Returns:
      the winning player, or null if game is not over

    • getDeckSize

      public int getDeckSize()
      Gets the current size of the deck.
      Returns:
      number of cards in deck

    • isDeckEmpty

      public boolean isDeckEmpty()
      Checks if the deck is empty.
      Returns:
      true if deck has no cards, false otherwise

    • getPlayerStats

      public GameModel.PlayerGameStats getPlayerStats(String playerName)
      Gets statistics for a specific player.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the player's name
      Returns:
      the player's statistics, or null if player not found

    • getAllPlayerStats

      public Map<String,GameModel.PlayerGameStats> getAllPlayerStats()
      Gets all player statistics.
      Returns:
      map of all player statistics (copy)

    • printPlayerStats

      public void printPlayerStats()
      Prints all player statistics to console. Displays cards played, turns played, and winner status for each player.
